Body: I'm using Samsung Galaxy S5. There is an icon which looks like a house with 2 waves in the notification bar, in between (and slightly above) the 4G and mobile signal strength icons.  Here's the screenshotClick to enlarge  I only saw it once and never again. I was reading text messages.
Title: What is "Cell signal with small house and 2 blinking bars" system icon?

history.Text: Samsung S5, very top of phone, in between and above the 4G and signal strength icons. There is an icon very tiny, is a house with 2 WiFi looking bars blinking.Only saw it once and never again. I was reading text messages.Thank you for your help!Cannot find answer anywhere when searching internet! I have screens hot of it, but am unable to attach to this message.
Unknown icon very top of S5

Samsung Galaxy S5, There is an icon very tiny, is a house with 2 waves in the notification bar, in between (and slightly above) the 4G and mobile signal strength icons.  Here's the screenshot  [![Screenshot][1]][2]  Click to enlarge  Only saw it once and never again. I was reading text messages.Thank you for your help!Cannot find answer anywhere when searching internet!   [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/yGBnEm.png  [2]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/yGBnE.png
